item.title: EP 831 - Do Ghosts Fight In Human Wars?
item.itunes:title: Do Ghosts Fight In Human Wars?
item.description:
Today we celebrate President’s Day by investigating a presidential ghost who led the Union to victory,  and then we look at some horrible true crime stories!

 

Patreon 

https://www.patreon.com/user?u=18482113

MERCH STORE!!!

https://tinyurl.com/y8zam4o2

Amazon Wish List

https://www.amazon.com/hz/wishlist/ls/28CIOGSFRUXAD?ref_=wl_share

 

Help Promote Dead Rabbit!

Dual Flyer

https://i.imgur.com/OhuoI2v.jpg

"As Above" Flyer

https://i.imgur.com/yobMtUp.jpg

“Alien Flyer” By TVP VT U

https://imgur.com/gallery/aPN1Fnw

 

Links:

Haunted Places: The National Directory: Ghostly Abodes, Sacred Sites, UFO Landings and Other Supernatural Locations

https://www.amazon.com/gp/product/B001R11CN0/ref=dbs_a_def_rwt_hsch_vapi_tkin_p1_i4

A GHOST AT GETTYSBURG: THE 20TH MAINE’S MYSTERIOUS ENCOUNTER

https://mb-henry.com/2018/07/11/a-ghost-at-gettysburg-the-20th-maines-mysterious-encounter/

George Washington’s Ghost Saved the Union

https://ghostsofny.com/blog/536/page/2/

Ghost Stories

https://www.mountvernon.org/preservation/mount-vernon-ladies-association/mount-vernon-through-time/ghost-stories/

Did George Washington's ghost appear to the union soldiers during the civil war and help them win? Theres a legend told for over 100 years that in 1863 George appeared on his horse shouting "charge fire bayonets " , many soldiers reported it

https://www.quora.com/Did-George-Washingtons-ghost-appear-to-the-union-soldiers-during-the-civil-war-and-help-them-win-Theres-a-legend-told-for-over-100-years-that-in-1863-George-appeared-on-his-horse-shouting-charge-fire-bayonets-many

Gettysburg Battlefield

https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Gettysburg_Battlefield

Teacher admits to feeding students cupcakes laced with her husband's sperm

https://tinyurl.com/2p8pn95e

Police Charges

https://www.brproud.com/wp-content/uploads/sites/80/2021/08/Perkins-Files-1.pdf

Music teacher in semen-tainted flute incident to plead guilty

https://nypost.com/2020/07/02/music-teacher-in-semen-tainted-flute-incident-to-plead-guilty/

New evidence leads to murder charge for suspect in hit-and-run crash

https://wwmt.com/news/local/new-evidence-leads-to-murder-charge-for-suspect-in-hit-and-run-crash

Man killed jogger with car to have sex with her dead body, prosecutors say

https://tinyurl.com/5n7dwepa

 

------------------------------------------------

Logo Art By Ash Black

Opening Song: "Atlantis Attacks"

Closing Song: "Bella Royale"

Music By Simple

Rabbitron 3000 created by Eerbud

Thanks to Chris K, Founder Of The Golden Rabbit Brigade

YouTube Champ Stewart Meatball

Paranormal, Conspiracy, and True Crime news as it happens! Jason Carpenter breaks the stories they'll be talking about tomorrow, assuming the world doesn't end today.
